metadata.command:
git commit -m "symfony7-migration - Phase 1 foundation complete

- Initialize Symfony 7.1.11 skeleton with PHP 8.3
- Install webapp pack (doctrine, security, twig, maker, phpunit)
- Configure MySQL database connection
- Create CmsBundle and ProjectManagerBundle structure
- Add comprehensive MIGRATION_ROADMAP.md (10 phases)
- Add QUICKSTART.md for developers

Phase 1 Complete:
✅ Symfony 7.1.11 skeleton
✅ 103 packages installed (doctrine 3.5, phpunit 12.4)
✅ Directory structure (src/bundles, config/, public/)
✅ Environment configuration (.env with MySQL)
✅ Migration documentation (roadmap + quick start)

Next: Phase 2 - Database & Entity Migration (User, Role, Settings)
"
